relation: They don't have on campus dorms but they offer living facilities off campus that is walking distance to WNC

Western Nevada College is a beautiful campus located in the gorgeous Sierras. When it comes to signing up for college or any questions you have the staff is there to help you. What makes this college easier to attend than most colleges in Northern Nevada is that they offer classes in different counties so you won't have to travel far to attend your classes.
pageTitle: Western Nevada College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {1172=It is way cheaper to go to a community college to get your basics out of the way. I priced it and it is exaclty a $1000 cheaper than an university and you are learning the same thing you would be learning at a university. I highly recommend going here for the first 2 years and then transfering., 125026=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: The atmosphere of this college is great. It is very productive and supportive. I enjoy going to school everyday. The teachers are great and very helpful and friendly, and the students are very friendly. Am learning a lot A community college is a great way to get the feel of how a university is like. The teachers at this school are very hands on and very knowlegable in their fields. I have learned a lot from being at this school. It has also helped me get the feel of what college professors expect. It has also given me the opportunity to achieve my goals. Login to rate or flag the reviews Jessica from Carson City, NV 01/05/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 2 of 33 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Anyone seeking to go to school for the first time or looking to go back.
